recipe.title: Berbere
ingredients: 1/2 cup ground dried Serrano chilies or other ground dried chilies
1 teaspoon ground cardamom, preferably freshly ground
instructions: Finely grind the fenugreek seeds with a mortar and pestle or in an electric spice or coffee grinder. Stir together with the remaining ingredients in a small bowl until well combined.
